question: I was recently diagnosed with Stage III kidney disease.  The doctor said my kidneys are not normal but they are filtering toxins out of my body, they are doing everything they are supposed to.  If they are doing everything they are supposed to  how are they not normal?type 2 diabetes(not well controlled)high blood pressure(not under control)high cholesterol(under control)arrhythmia(under control)V Leiden blood clotting factor(under control)
title: What does this mean:  "Not normal, but doing everything they should".
